document_data.name: Habrauk Al-Nirin
document_data.mainbody: '''Habrauk Al-Nirin''' was a man from the Al-Alisk clan. He kidnapped Princess [[Sithal Al-Husn]] and froze her in a magical box to preserve her beauty. The archmage [[Martek]] used his clan's crypt as a test for adventurers seeking his crystal minaret.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|109}}
document_data.Appearance: As of {{yearlink|1356}}, Habrauk Al-Nirin was a spectre dressed in ancient robes of royal design.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|125}}
document_data.Powers: Habrauk Al-Nirin had all the powers of a spectre.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|124}}
document_data.History:
Habrauk was totally smitten with Princess [[Sithal Al-Husn]]'s beauty. He kidnapped her from the city of Akhir on the day of her wedding to [[Athis Al-Din]], and placed her in an enchanted box to keep her beauty forever.

The blood feud would continue to play out nightly until {{yearlink|1356}}, when the Princess' spirit was finally released by adventurers after Martek's crystal minaret.
